specialRules.title: God Machine Killer (GMK)
description: Has TK(D6) instead of TK(D3) against WE with the God Machine special rule.

unit.name: Harbringer Bomber
unit.notes: Critical Hit Effect: The Harbringer Bomber is destroyed

unit.name: Blightbringer Bomber
unit.notes: Critical Hit Effect: The Blightbringer Bomber is destroyed

unit.name: Devastation Class Cruiser
unit.notes: Transport. May transport 20 infantry units or Chaos Dreadnoughts and enough Dreadclaws to transport any other units being carried.

unit.name: Plagueship
specialRules: Slow to Arrive (May only arrive from turn 2 onwards)

unit.name: Despoiler Class Battleship
specialRules: Slow to Arrive (May only arrive from turn 2 onwards)
unit.notes: Transport. May transport 30 infantry units or Chaos Dreadnoughts and enough Dreadclaws to transport any other units being carried.
